incident.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.
A newer version of `compileSdkVersion` than 34 is available: 36
A newer version of androidx.core:core-ktx than 1.12.0 is available: 1.17.0

Fixed screen orientations will be ignored in most cases, starting from Android 16. Android is moving toward a model where apps are expected to adapt to various orientations, display sizes, and aspect ratios.
